clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of the Quality of Recovery Questionnaire for the Postanesthesia Care Unit (QoR-PACU)
clinical_study.official_title: Adaptation and Validation of the Quality of Recovery 15-questionnaire for the Postanesthesia Care Unit

brief_summary.textblock: Quality of recovery after surgery and anesthesia is an important endpoint in perioperative medicine. Several questionnaires have been developed that assess the patient's perception on postoperative recovery at 24 h after surgery. This study aims to adapt validate the Quality of Recovery 15-questionnaire for application in the postanesthesia care unit.

primary_outcome.measure: 16-item quality of recovery questionnaire for the postanesthesia care unit (QoR-PACU)

clinical_study.condition: Postoperative Quality of Recovery in the Postanesthesia Care Unit

intervention.description: 16-item quality of recovery questionnaire for the postanesthesia care unit (QoR-PACU)

study_pop.textblock: Patients scheduled for non-cardiac surgery under general anesthesia in a postanesthesia care unit at a tertiary care hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- elective non-cardiac surgery
- general anesthesia
- fluency in German
Exclusion Criteria:
- postoperative intensive care unit stay
